name: The TunnelMan
storyline:
"The story so far...
As a miner, you always have to work underground for very long hours. Since the whole family's income is dependend on yours, you always have to work overtime in order to support their needs.

It was a stormy night. All the other workers had already left an hour ago but you were still working very hard. The rain was heavy and water started to flow into the tunnel. Suddenly you hear a big bang. Your curiosity drove you to find out what had happened. as you walked towards the exit, what you saw in front of you was a large pile of mud and rocks. The landslide had blocked the exit that you normally ..."
